user_query: I want to organize a surprise birthday party for my best friend who loves webcams. Can you suggest some unique party themes based on the categories of webcams? Additionally, I would like to find business photos of venues suitable for the party.

TaskList.description: Research and suggest unique party themes based on different categories of webcams.
Identify venues that can host a surprise birthday party and are related to webcams.
Fetch business photos of the identified venues suitable for the party.
